sys_robust_import_set_transformer.description:
Here are some examples of how to utilize IRE properties for a single transform. Here, if we set the skip_updating_source_last_discovered_to_now to true it will adjust the behavior of this RTE transform definition by preventing the last_discoverd and discovery source fields from being updated which can be helpful for integrations where we may only want to have a sys_object_source record created.
SN Docs: https://docs.servicenow.com/csh?topicname=robust-import-set-xform-props.html&version=latest
https://docs.servicenow.com/csh?topicname=properties-id-reconciliation.html&version=latest
sys_robust_import_set_transformer.name: Example RTE Import (Single Column)
